    All functions used to perform the regex Matching

        All functions used to perform the regex Matching

    • Method Detail

      • filterString

        @NotNull
public java.lang.String filterString(@NotNull
                                              java.lang.String string,
                                              boolean isStep)

        change all "an" to "a" escape all regex symbols unless it is a variable or a step string

        Parameters:
        string - the template string
        Returns:
        prepared string to be used for precalculations for regex

        Returns:

      • templateStepToRegexString

        @NotNull
public kotlin.Pair<java.lang.String,java.util.List> templateStepToRegexString(@NotNull
                                                                                       java.lang.String value)

        getting the variables and creating the regex by replacing the "{variable}" with regexes.

        variable is in final two strings case 1: "string string {variable} string" & "string string {variable}"

        variable is at the beginning or at any other position case 2: "string {variable} string string"

        the template has only one string as component case 3: "{variable}" & "string"

        Parameters:
        value - the input string(step template)
        Returns:
        Pair of regex as string and the map with the variable names
